review: Bottom line; I would not buy this product if I had it to do over again.  On the other hand, I don't dislike it enough to go through the hassle of sending it back.Build and packaging quality are high.  And, the interface is pretty straight-forward.  However, Amazon has decided to take a page from the Apple playbook and has designed this device so that it does not play well with others.  If you own music on Google play, do not buy this.  If you own movies on Vudu, do not buy this.  If you want to surf the web on your TV, do not buy this.On the other hand, if you want to watch Netflix and Amazon Prime video and pretty much nothing else (except maybe play games), this device is perfect.After using this device for a couple of weeks, and even sideloading some apps in an attempt to make it more usable, I'm left wishing I had gone with a Roku.
